content: {"name": "Holy Redeemer Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call (313) 842-3450 to make an appointment if you're in need of emergency food.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.holyredeemerdetroit.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1721 Junction Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Central Southwest", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48209", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3169853, "longitude": -83.1021013}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 842-3450", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
